## Introduction

This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) document written for the capstone project of the  [Data Science Coursera Specialization](https://www.coursera.org/specializations/jhu-data-science). More specifically it aims to adress the task 2 of the capstone project : "Exploratory Data Analysis" by providing the following elements :

1. Basic summaries of the data files :  word counts, line counts and basic data tables

2. Basic plots, such as histograms to illustrate features of the data
